citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee paperwork was not available for review and
examination by APHIS officials. Facility was asked to provide the paperwork in a timely manner, and was unable to.
Review of IACUC paperwork ensures the IACUC is functioning as intended to ensure the welfare of the animals used by
the facility.
Correct for all future inspections
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.38(b)(1)(ii) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
At the time of inspection, the Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee paperwork was not available for review and 
examination by APHIS officials.  Facility was asked to provide the paperwork in a timely manner, and was unable to.  
Review of IACUC paperwork ensures the IACUC is functioning as intended to ensure the welfare of the animals used by 
the facility. 
 
Correct for all future inspections 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
